name: Undead Slayer
summary: Excellent, colorful and dynamic slasher turned out to be good enough. Elements of RPG will let you upgrade your hero and get new abilities. Ruthless Hordes of monsters want to bring whole world to its knees. But you are chosen by the will of gods and will surely prevent the catastrophe. You will have no rest; rush into the battle bravely and save the world from tyranny.
